00039 class Matrice;
00040 class Matrice_Base;
00041 class Matrice_Morse;
00042 class Matrice_Morse_Sym;
00043 class IntTab;
00044 class ArrOfDouble;
00045 class DoubleTab;
00046 class Matrix_tools
00047 {
00048 public :
00049 // conversion to morse format
00050   static void convert_to_morse_matrix( const Matrice_Base& in,
00051                                        Matrice_Morse&      out );
00052 
00053 // conversion to symetric morse format
00054   static void convert_to_symmetric_morse_matrix( const Matrice_Base& in,
00055                                                  Matrice_Morse_Sym&  out );
00056 
00057 // checking stencil
00058   static bool is_normalized_stencil( const IntTab& stencil );
00059 
00060 // checking symmetric stencil
00061   static bool is_normalized_symmetric_stencil( const IntTab& stencil );
00062 
00063 // building morse matrices by creating new matrix (from given stencil)
00064 // so we need to specify is the stencil is to attach or not to the matrix
00065   static void allocate_morse_matrix( const int&  nb_lines,
00066                                      const int&  nb_columns,
00067                                      const IntTab&  stencil,
00068                                      Matrice_Morse& matrix,
00069                                      const bool& attach_stencil_to_matrix=false);
00070 
00071   static void build_morse_matrix( const int&      nb_lines,
00072                                   const int&      nb_columns,
00073                                   const IntTab&      stencil,
00074                                   const ArrOfDouble& coefficients,
00075                                   Matrice_Morse&     matrix );
00076 
00077 // building symmetric morse matrices
00078   static void allocate_symmetric_morse_matrix( const int&      order,
00079                                                const IntTab&      stencil,
00080                                                Matrice_Morse_Sym& matrix );
00081 
00082   static void build_symmetric_morse_matrix( const int&      order,
00083                                             const IntTab&      stencil,
00084                                             const ArrOfDouble& coefficients,
00085                                             Matrice_Morse_Sym& matrix );
00086 
00087 // allocation for scaled addition
00088   static void allocate_for_scaled_addition( const Matrice& A,
00089                                             const Matrice& B,
00090                                             Matrice&       C );
00091 
00092   static void allocate_for_symmetric_scaled_addition( const Matrice& A,
00093                                                       const Matrice& B,
00094                                                       Matrice&       C );
00095 
00096 // scaled addition
00097   static void add_scaled_matrices( const Matrice& A,
00098                                    const double&  alpha,
00099                                    const Matrice& B,
00100                                    const double&  beta,
00101                                    Matrice&       C );
00102 
00103   static void add_symmetric_scaled_matrices( const Matrice& A,
00104                                              const double&  alpha,
00105                                              const Matrice& B,
00106                                              const double&  beta,
00107                                              Matrice&       C );
00108 
00109 // stencil analysis
00110   static bool is_null_stencil( const IntTab& stencil );
00111 
00112   static bool is_diagonal_stencil( const int& nb_lines,
00113                                    const int& nb_columns,
00114                                    const IntTab& stencil );
00115 
00116 // allocation from stencil specification
00117   static void allocate_from_stencil( const int& nb_lines,
00118                                      const int& nb_columns,
00119                                      const IntTab& stencil,
00120                                      Matrice&      matrix,
00121                                      const bool& attach_stencil_to_matrix=false);
00122 
00123 // extending a matrix's stencil
00124   static void extend_matrix_stencil( const IntTab& stencil,
00125                                      Matrice&      matrix,
00126                                      const bool& attach_stencil_to_matrix=false );
00127 
00128 
00129 // diagonal matrix times a square morse matrix 'mat'
00130 // if inverse then the 1/diag is used
00131 // this can be seen as a left multiplication
00132   static void matdiag_mult_matmorse( const DoubleTab& diag,
00133                                      Matrice_Morse& mat,
00134                                      const bool& inverse );
00135 
00136 // right multiplication version of matdiag_mult_matmorse
00137   static void matmorse_mult_matdiag( const DoubleTab& diag,
00138                                      Matrice_Morse& mat,
00139                                      const bool& inverse );
00140 
00141 
00142 // uniform diagonal matrix (i.e. same coefficient on the diag) times a square morse matrix 'mat'
00143 // if inverse then the 1/diag is used
00144 // this can be seen as a left multiplication
00145   static void uniform_matdiag_mult_matmorse( const double& diag,
00146                                              Matrice_Morse& mat,
00147                                              const bool& inverse );
00148 
00149 // right multiplication version of uniform_matdiag_mult_matmorse
00150   static void matmorse_mult_uniform_matdiag( const double& diag,
00151                                              Matrice_Morse& mat,
00152                                              const bool& inverse );
00153 
00154 // add empty rows/columns to matrix
00155   static void extend_matrix(Matrice_Morse& mat, int nl, int nc);
00156 };
